od:fieldProperty.name: RowSource
od:fieldProperty.value: SELECT BusinessRoles.ID, BusinessRoles.Role FROM BusinessRoles ORDER BY BusinessRoles.Role;

od:fieldProperty.name: ValidationText
od:fieldProperty.value: Nombre de Usuario is un campo obligatorio

od:fieldProperty.name: RowSource
od:fieldProperty.value: SELECT UserType.ID, UserType.UserType, UserType.Description FROM UserType ORDER BY UserType.UserType;

od:fieldProperty.name: ValidationText
od:fieldProperty.value: Tipo de Usuario es un campo oblicatorio.
